D_SkillPerk00: Perks give you advantages, hope for survival. Click to read.
D_SkillPerk01: You are used to acting decisively. When the target is in front of you, you turn into a train without a stopcock (+1 STR)
D_SkillPerk02: Now you critically analyze everything. You even see through your opponents (+5 EXP after each successful event, you see the current health of enemies).
D_SkillPerk03: The lives and health of your furry patients depend on your every decision. It has developed a manic habit of double-checking everything (+1 WIS)
D_SkillPerk04: You live in the world of art and understand how beauty is born. You can distinguish the original of the painting from the copy and notice the important details of any work (+1 PRC)
D_SkillPerk05: Productivity, self-development, yoga. Now it is difficult to upset you (+1 Sanity after each successful event, +10 COUNT permanently)
D_SkillPerk06: Because of the habit of hard work, you have spent a lot of time outdoors and outdoors. This has hardened your body and immunity(+1 HRD).
D_SkillPerk07: You know how to benefit where it cannot be (+10 MONEY after each successful event)
D_SkillPerk08: You've been hitting the gym so often that you've developed an unhealthy habit of exercising constantly. Don't forget, by the way, to complete 20 squats (+1 Health after each successful event)
D_SkillPerk09: You are the face of the group. All the attention of the audience is focused primarily on you, and it doesn’t matter where – on a live performance or in a video clip (+1 INS)
D_SkillPerk10: Your body has experienced multiple shocks, and the skin seems to be covered with a second rough layer. Nevertheless, you have not become less nimble from this (+1 DEX)
D_SkillPerk11: Now you are living with the news that a parasite is developing inside you (-1 max SAN). But there is also a plus- by concentrating all your perception on the body, you can make it fall asleep for a short time (+ 1 COUNT after a successful event).
D_SkillPerk12: You use the interior and walls for the most successful evasion of enemy attacks (+3 critical. evasion)
D_SkillPerk13: Once you have gained distance, you push the enemy with your shoulder and knock them to the floor (+80% chance to paralyze the enemy).
D_SkillPerk14: Tasty! VERY TASTY! Now Strange meat will replenish your health by 5. But even you understand that it's not good to eat your own kind, so Max Sanity -2 forever.
D_SkillPerk15: You remember that this has already happened to you. Now you are able to perform some actions reflexively.
D_SkillPerk16: During your stay at the hotel, you have encountered many horrors. But they are not able to shake your psyche. It becomes almost impossible to surprise you (+5 SAN forever)
D_SkillPerk17: Multiple battles with wild animals were not in vain. Now you are a trained and deadly machine to adjust their numbers (+15% damage against wild animals)
D_SkillPerk18: Using a piece of clothing, or a third-party item, you can defend against beasts extremely effectively (increased damage against animals).
D_SkillPerk19: By performing a mysterious ritual, you have gained the ability to restore your wounds. In times of extreme stress, focus on your body using your intuition.
D_SkillPerk20:
You in rage, filled with determination to fight the horrors.
Strike will deal damage equal to your stamina and strength.
D_SkillPerk21: Throw your leg forward and aim for the chest to knock your opponent down. This strike will deal damage equal to the sum of your Strength and Dexterity.
D_SkillPerk22: You've been injured enough to know that luck is not on your side. Adrenaline will give you speed, so you have the greatest chance of running away like a coward from this fight.
D_SkillPerk23: Sometimes a situation calls for a creative approach. Now, with a 10% chance, your INSIGHT stat will affect every check except for insight itself.
Stat_SAN_Lost2:
Hugged to the floor, with bristling hair, dogs bark at you furiously, with a hoarse roar. Against your will, arousing some distant, almost primal, horror.
(-1 Sanity after each turn)
Stat_STR_rise2:
Several individuals have surrounded you. On your own, there is little you can do against them. This number of dogs is enough to tear you apart like a rag.
(+ATK for each opponent)
DogsRage1: You're doing well. The seasoned beast is breathing heavily and covered in bleeding wounds. But it seems that, sensing imminent death, he is ready to spend all his remaining strength on the most deadly and furious attacks.
